quest.name: Operation Crucible Down
journal: Bloeidin could use your aid in creating a diversion.

Bloeidin has a mind to destroy a new crucible that the alchemically inclined kobolds have developed, and has tasked you with creating a diversion. Travel to Iron Lake and use the makeshift bombs provided by the commander to blow up piles of kobold supplies to draw their attention away from the primary target.
You have destroyed the kobold supplies as per your orders. Return to Bloeidin and inquire as to the success of the mission.
Bloeidin informs you that, thanks in no small part to your efforts, the operation was a success. The loss of their crucible should take the wind out of the kobolds' sails for the foreseeable future.
objectives: Use makeshift bombs to blow up kobold supplies.

dialogue.name: BLOEIDIN
dialogue.text: Well, we can't let my men have all the fun, now can we? What say you join us in a little operation that's sure to hit the kobolds where it hurts the most─in the crucible.

dialogue.name: BLOEIDIN
dialogue.text: As you know, the beasts pride themselves on their alchemical skills. We've located a hidden storehouse containing a prototype for a new crucible. I don't know what it's capable of, and I'm not of a mind to find out. I would charge you with drawing the kobolds' attention while my levy sees to the crucible.

dialogue.name: BLOEIDIN
dialogue.text: Take these makeshift bombs to Iron Lake, where you'll find stores of sundry provisions belonging to the kobold army─I trust you'll know what to do from there. And mind you: the bigger the explosion, the better.

dialogue.name: BLOEIDIN
dialogue.text: Good work─why, I reckon I heard those blasts all the way from here! You'll be pleased to know that the operation was a rousing success: the crucible is no more.

dialogue.name: BLOEIDIN
dialogue.text: Aye, this should keep the kobolds quiet for a spell. Ah, nothin' like the pleasure of a job well done. I reckon the grog we guzzle tonight will be the finest we've had in months.
